original_text: Then Saul prayed to the Lord, the God of Israel, “Why have you not answered your servant today? If the fault is in me or my son Jonathan, respond with Urim, but if the men of Israel are at fault, respond with Thummim.” Jonathan and Saul were taken by lot, and the men were cleared.
korean_text: 이에 사울이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께 아뢰되 원하건대 실상을 보이소서 하였더니 요나단과 사울이 뽑히고 백성은 면한지라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul prayed to the Lord
Why have you not answered your servant today?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 오늘 당신의 종에게 응답하지 않으셨나이까?

sentences.original_text: If the fault is in me or my son Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 허물이 나나 내 아들 요나단에게 있다면

sentences.original_text: but if the men of Israel are at fault
Jonathan and Saul were taken by lot
